description:
Tamaki Iroha is a Magical Girl who lives in Takarazaki City. She is very responsible, but being overly considerate toward everyone around her, she does not fit in at school. Iroha cannot remember the wish she made when she became a Magical Girl, so she decides to go to Kamihama City to investigate a certain rumor that could provide her with answers.
Source: Official site
name: Tamaki Iroha
